data.title: Madison Area Technical College
data.meta_description: Madison College provides top, hands-on training in 190+ degree and certificate programs at 7 local campuses with online, accelerated and part-time options. Consider dozens of direct college transfer options. Or simply take a class for fun!
data.text:
Indicates required field

start

Find your path at Madison College

Tell us a bit about yourself and we’ll guide you to the Madison College academic offerings and next steps that best fit your interests. Need help deciding? Contact us.

q1_page

Are you in school right now?

Select the one option that best fits

I’m in high school, middle school or elementary school

I’m in college

I’m not in school right now

q2_page

Great. Would you like to earn college credit in high school?

Yes, I’d like to take college classes with my high school teachers

Yes, I’d like to take college classes with Madison College instructors

Yes, I’d like to work as an apprentice while in high school

No, I’m not interested in earning early college credit

q3_page

Have you considered transferring to Madison College?

Yes

No

q4_page

Are you currently employed?

Yes

No

q5_page

Got it. What’s next for your career?

I’d like to advance in my career

I’m interested in exploring a career change

I want to improve my business

I’d like to start a new business

q6_page

What is your educational goal?

I want to earn college credit

I’d like to grow my career

I’m just learning for fun

I want to earn my GED or HSED

I want to work as an apprentice while I learn

q7_page

Next up—college credits. What type of college credit would you like to earn?

I’m interested in earning a degree or credential

I’d like to take a few courses

I’m not sure right now; I’m just exploring my options

q8_page

What are you interested in studying at Madison College?

Architecture and Engineering

Arts, Design and Humanities

Business

Construction, Manufacturing and Maintenance

Culinary, Hospitality and Fitness

Education and Social Sciences

Health Sciences

Information Technology

Law, Protective and Human Services

Science, Math and Natural Resources

Transportation

q9_page

What type of degree or credential would you like to earn?

Certificate

Technical Diploma

Associate Degree

Bachelor’s Degree

Master’s Degree or PhD

I’m not sure

q10_page

That’s awesome. When would you like to earn your degree or credential?

Within the next 6 months

Within the next year

Within the next 2 years

More than 2 years from now

I have no specific timeframe in mind

q11_page

Are you interested in one of our student support options?

I want to improve my English reading, writing and language skills

I’d like extra support transitioning into a health or vet tech program

I’d like extra support transitioning into a nursing program

I’d like help preparing for an apprenticeship

I’d like to get support finishing high school while earning college credit

I’m interested in other academic or career support from Madison College

No thanks, I don’t need additional support

q12_page

Would you like to transfer course credit to another college or university?

Yes, I’d like to know about my transfer options

No, not at this time
